name: Shroommon
description:
Smash your way to the top of the leaderboards! This game was made for the GBJAM 5 https://itch.io/jam/gbjam-5

To play, simply move around using the controls below. The longer you let an enemy shroom grow, the more points you get for smashing it, but you'll be taking more of a risk. The game gets more difficult as you smash more enemy shrooms. You lose when an enemy shroom reaches the top of the screen.

Controls

  • move left - left arrow
  • move right - right arrow
  • jump - space
  • smash - space
  • toggle sound - m
  • pause game - p
